name: Karnage 2019
description:
Graduation Video Game 
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

In a huge arena, you play a driver in a heavily-armed vehicle fighting against a giant monster.
Find the flaws of the monster, activate traps when needed and, with the bull-bar of your car, strike down this filthy creature.

Platform : PC + Controller
Engine : Unreal Engine 4
Number of players : 1
Genre : Action

Producer : Guillaume Bleuze
Game Art : Julia Blardat, Nicolas Drouart, Sarah-Cheyenne Gil-Bercovici, Yohan Schmitz
Game Programming : Benoit Ly, Antoine Simon, Valentin Zander
Music & Sound Design : Djaffar Lebdiri
